links.title: Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting
links.description: Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done.

body: $AAPL I’m still long! Apple to 165

$AAPL $AMC $SPY $QQQ for the remainder of this year we will see futures go from red to green and Vice versa on the daily. The big boys want to maximize on the volatility. Hence, they will want to maximize on options during normal trading hours. Premium prices will not truly coincide with the stock price given there will exist max greed! A lot of opportunities to profit!

body: $AAPL Smells like big stock buyback tomorrow
$AAPL it is the best company in the Market period..however not buying shares until $150..we need to learn about discipline

$AAPL FUTURES TOOK A leg lower when the FOXCONN news dropped on Apple Inc factories suspending production in 2 locations for iPhones... 🥒📉 There goes TECH for Tomorrow! $nflx $tsla $fb $spy  
 
 
RUN BULLS RUN!!

$AAPL I’ll leave you with this. The Foxconn news is old news. They shut down those two locations on Wednesday. If I’m not mistaken, last time Foxconn shutdown the stock jumped the next day. You have to be very careful about the news and how it pertains to the stock price.

body: $AAPL $SPY $QQQ $AMC the truth is, futures don’t matter till 9 am eastern time. Most of the times it ends up being the opposite of where we started. We’re at a time of extreme volatility. You’ll just end up driving yourself nuts. Enjoy your Sunday then get ready to play bright and early!

body:
$SPY $AAPL $TSLA it's incredible that We The People, can't wake up and see how our own government is counterfeiting trillions of dollars and robbing us of our purchasing power. 
There's protests for Covid shutdowns and BLM, but nothing for the trillion dollar robbery taking place in broad daylight. 
Why ARE housing prices up 50% in 2 years? FOOD prices up 30%? There should be huge CIVIL unrest. Look at Sri Lanka and Peru. 
Americans are weak AND afraid of the government. Even in France they protest in the streets.

Posted this Chart of NASDAQ set to go lower
We shall see ……..
POS $QQQ Below 30 SMA And 30 EMA now <30 SMA both have turned below 150 EMA 
Once again the 30 EMA 30 MA could act as Resistance 
Entire Market would continue lower
due margin calls 
VIX heads higher towards 30 - 42
